definitions.definition: A hobby in which participants attempt to locate small boxes containing rubber stamps by following clues.
The practice of transferring film shot in a widescreen aspect ratio to standard - width video formats while preserving the film 's original aspect ratio .

main_definition: A hobby in which participants attempt to locate small boxes containing rubber stamps by following clues.
secondary_definitions: ( film ) The practice of transferring film shot in a widescreen aspect ratio to standard - width video formats while preserving the film 's original aspect ratio .
